transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker A: Hello?
Speaker B: Yeah, hello, am I speaking? Khadija Mustafa here.
Speaker A: Yeah, you are?
Speaker B: Yeah, hello Khadija, we shot the site calling you from Ambassador and this call is regarding your students. Yeah, sorry, from where the set, Risha? From Amber Student, the scholars regarding your student accommodation for Yugothari, South London.
Speaker A: Yeah, I haven't booked anything yet, but thank you for the call.
Speaker B: I do understand that because we have received your details that you wish to proceed ahead with, you know, on the room type, yoga TDs house and the room type which you want to go with is standard studio, is it correct?
Speaker A: Yeah, but I'm not booking anything yet.
Speaker B: Okay, so you are you excluding the option at the moment?
Speaker A: Yeah. What's the availability on the room if I do book it?
Speaker B: So the room is available at the moment. I can see there are six or seven studios at the moment that has been left.
Speaker A: Okay, that's fine. Yeah, I haven't booked anything yet. But how long does the application only take? If I wanted to, it will take.
Speaker B: At least three or two to generate the offer.
Speaker A: Okay, well, thank you for your help.
Speaker B: I'll do one thing here. I can block the room for now. You don't have say anything. Let me block the room for now. If you wish to proceed ahead later in the day or like by tomorrow, like suppose if you wish to proceed ahead with this property, all you need to do is you need to log in into the student portal and pay up the deposit so that we don't miss out the room. So I. I'll do one thing here since I already have your details, I'll block this to you without a payment. And later on if you wish to proceed ahead with this option, you can just make the payment and accept the agreement.
Speaker A: How much is the. I didn't hear what you said. Sorry, say that again.
Speaker B: Okay, so what I'm saying here is I can block the room for now without a payment and later on if you wish to proceed ahead with this room, all you need to do is you need to pay the deposit and accept the agreement.
Speaker A: Okay, how much is the deposit?
Speaker B: Sorry, just a moment. So the deposit amount here. The deposit amount is £500.
Speaker A: Okay, that's fine. Thank you so much.
Speaker B: Okay, so should I block it for now at the moment?
Speaker A: Yeah, sure. Thank you.
Speaker B: You're welcome.
Speaker A: Thank you. Bye bye.

Speaker A: Hello? Yeah, hello, Am I speaking with Khadija here? Yeah. Yeah, Khadija, we have blocked your room for now. And this. We just had a conversation like few hours back. Honestly, I'm just looking. So at the moment I just don't want any more phone calls just because I am still looking around. But that's okay. Yeah, that's absolutely fine. The reason only why I gave you the call is because you need to verify the email which you have received from you. Okay, I will do that soon. But yeah, I just don't want any more phone calls at the moment. Once I'm having, I won't do it. If anything needed, I will reach out to you on WhatsApp. Okay. Okay, that's fine. Thank you. Bye. Bye. Bye. Bye.

Speaker B: Hello.
Speaker A: Yeah. Hello.
Speaker B: Hello.
Speaker A: Yeah, hello. Khajiit from Amber Student.
Speaker B: Okay. Hi.
Speaker A: Hi. How are you?
Speaker B: Good, thank you. How are you?
Speaker A: I'm also good. Just wanted to confirm if you have booked the property which we have shortlisted earlier, the Yugo one.
Speaker B: No, I haven't had a chance to look at anything yet.
Speaker A: So you. You haven't basically booked any property yet?
Speaker B: No.
Speaker A: Okay. So should I share you some more options regarding the same.
Speaker B: No, no, no, it's okay. Thank you.
Speaker A: Okay. So are you going to, you know, book another accommodation or like, live into a private property?
Speaker B: Honestly, don't worry. If I need anything.
Speaker A: I'll give you a phone call. Okay. Thank you.
Speaker B: Bye. Bye.
